name: LivermoreFoodTruckFinder
0:
”Alexa open Livermore scene”
”find food trucks on Friday”
”search for food this weekend”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: livermore scene
des:
Live in or near Livermore? Enjoy visiting breweries? Love supporting the local food truck scene? Enthralled by combining all of those things and enjoying a local brew and food truck while in Livermore? If you answered yes to those questions, then this is the skill for you!

Disclaimer: the food truck search is limited to those locations which publish a public calendar of events on their web site. Most local locations only update their calendar once a week, if at all. If you would like to see more locations added in the future then encourage your local vendors to keep their web sites up to date with current events.
